638c5325-4cba-4bd9-90bb-ec5197b56bc3.bot_reply: Looks like the classic iTrust web app: a Java/Maven WAR for managing patient health records (appointments, prescriptions, lab procedures, billing, messaging, access logs) with multiple roles (patients, HCPs, admins, UAP/ER/etc.). It deploys to Tomcat at /iTrust and builds the DB/test data via exec-maven-plugin (pom.xml). Paths like WebRoot and controllers (e.g., RecordsReleaseServlet, OfficeVisitController) handle medical data workflows.
